CmdLine: apt-get update && 	apt-get install wget build-essential -y && 	wget https://cmake.org/files/v3.7/cmake-3.7.1.tar.gz && 	tar xvf cmake-3.7.1.tar.gz && 	cd cmake-3.7.1 && 	./configure && 	make && 	make install && 	cd .. && rm -rf cmake-3.7.1 &&         rm cmake-3.7.1.tar.gz && 	apt-get -y clean all && 	rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
